Casa Xaver, Mérida, MX

Available now for your next Yucatán adventure.

item.title: The Neighborhood
item.description:
The Neighborhood

Santa Ana is a neighborhood near the Paseo Montejo. You'll find great restaurants, art galleries, shops, weekly musical events, and a traditional market here. It's a short walk to all of the best sites in Mérida.

item.title: Reserve through remixto.com
item.description:
Reserve through remixto.com

Choose from over 50 one-of-a-kind vacation rental homes Merida and the Yucatan Gulf Coast. Each unique home offers world-class amenities and personalized travel services that allow you to escape, indulge and explore the rich culture and history of the Yucatan.

item.title: The House
item.description:
The House

A stylish updated home with preserved details and modern amenities.
